algorithm.title: algorithm
algorithm.description: Algorithm to use. rsa or ecc.

api_ver.title: api_ver
api_ver.description: Whether to use Verified Access API v1 or v2.

ca_url.title: ca_url
ca_url.description: URL of your ACME CA. Should end in /directory

register_token.title: register_token
register_token.description: true or false, whether to register a key during verified access challenge response

user_or_machine_key.title: user_or_machine_key
user_or_machine_key.description: Whether to create a user or machine-wide certificate. Should be user or machine.
